text: læa phu thi klaw kæ bida marda khxng khea wa xuf kæ than thang sxng than thang sxng khu chan wa chan ca thuk hı xxk ma fun khunchiph xik kranan hrux? Thang «thi hlay stwrrsʹ kxn hna chan di lwnglab pi læw læa khea thang sxng rxngkhx khwam chwy he lux tx xallxhˌ (phlang klaw kæ luk wa) khwam hayna cng prasb kæ cea cng sraththa theid thæcring sayya khx ngxallxhˌ nan pen khwam cring læw khea k phud wa reuxng ni michı xari xun nxkcak pen niyay helwhil smay kxn theanan
